MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK1 postcode area of Camelon. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3pm to disconnect the generator from the network and this may affect the supply  to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:03pm on the 24th of April 2021
